name: localess
description: Localess is a self-hosted localization management system that streamlines translations for apps or websites. It offers project management, role-based access, context-based translation preview, and export options.
features: Translation Management: Multi-language support, Context preview, Export formats. Streamline app localization.
Project Organization: Multiple projects, Role-based access, Team collaboration. Manage translations at scale.
Developer Tools: API access, Import/export, Version control. Integrate with your workflow.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your translation data.
